conclusion: Determine which container the liquids will flow into after passing through the baffles.
Liquid A (Orange) enters from the top left.
Liquid A flows downward and is directed by the leftmost baffle (light cyan).
The light cyan baffle directs Liquid A to the left.
Liquid A flows into Container E.
Liquid B (Light Blue) enters from the top center-left.
Liquid B flows downward and encounters the first baffle (pink).
The pink baffle directs Liquid B to the right.
Liquid B flows into Container F.
Liquid C (Blue) enters from the top center.
Liquid C flows downward and encounters the second baffle (green).
The green baffle directs Liquid C to the right.
Liquid C flows into Container F.
Liquid D (Yellow) enters from the top center-right.
Liquid D flows downward and does not encounter any baffles that redirect it.
Liquid D flows straight down into Container F.
Final answer: Liquid A flows into Container E; Liquids B, C, and D flow into Container F.
